proposal1.heroHeadline: Neon Ambition is losing over 500 hours annually on proposal creation. Here's where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting SEO, PPC, and Social Media proposals takes hours. Generate them in 47 seconds instead.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are real costs bleeding from your bottom line every day.

problems.title: Lost Sales Opportunities
problems.description: Every hour spent writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. With 16 team members, that's a significant loss in potential revenue.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled marketers to draft proposals is costly. You could save thousands annually by automating this task.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding in proposals can confuse potential clients. Each inconsistency weakens your market positioning.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: A slow proposal process means delayed client engagement. Each delay risks losing the client's interest to a faster competitor.

problems.title: Reduced Productivity
problems.description: Time spent on manual proposals reduces overall team productivity. Fewer hours are available for core marketing activities.

problems.title: Missed Leads
problems.description: Manually handling proposals limits the number you can send. Each missed proposal is a missed opportunity for new leads.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system transforms every problem into an efficient process.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours of manual work. Our system generates them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Branding inconsistencies occur with manual creation. The system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Increased Productivity
solutions.description: Time-consuming manual tasks reduce productivity. With automation, your team can focus on driving sales and strategy.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Engagement
solutions.description: Delays in proposal delivery risk losing clients. The system ensures rapid responses to client inquiries.

solutions.title: Scalable Lead Handling
solutions.description: Manual proposal handling limits scalability. Our solution allows you to handle more leads effortlessly.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Neon Ambition's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Neon Ambition around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Neon Ambition.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Unleash Acme Corp's Potential with Neon Ambition's Proven Growth Strategies.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will transform your online presence through targeted SEO, PPC, and engaging content, driving more sales and leads.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every day, Acme Corp is losing opportunities and revenue by not optimizing its online presence.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Visitors who leave your site without engaging are missed opportunities. This can mean thousands in lost revenue monthly.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: Potential customers are slipping through the cracks, resulting in significant revenue loss.

problems.title: Poor SEO Performance
problems.description: Being buried in search results means lost visibility and traffic, translating to missed sales.

problems.title: Ineffective PPC Campaigns
problems.description: Without strategic targeting, your ad spend is not converting into tangible returns.

problems.title: Stagnant Social Media
problems.description: Lack of engagement on social channels leads to missed brand awareness and potential customer interactions.

problems.title: Outdated Content
problems.description: Failing to refresh content results in loss of interest and diminished trust from potential clients.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions address these critical losses and drive measurable improvements.

solutions.title: SEO Services
solutions.description: Boosts your visibility and search rankings, driving more organic traffic to your site.

solutions.title: PPC Campaigns
solutions.description: Maximize your ad spend by targeting the right audience with high-converting ads.

solutions.title: Content Marketing
solutions.description: Engage and convert your audience with fresh, relevant content.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Build and maintain a vibrant social presence, boosting brand awareness and engagement.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Neon Ambition is your partner in achieving digital success.

whyUsCards.title: Experienced Team
whyUsCards.description: Our team of experts has a track record of delivering results for businesses like yours.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Strategies
whyUsCards.description: We use data-driven approaches to ensure your marketing efforts are effective.

whyUsCards.title: Results-Focused
whyUsCards.description: Our primary goal is to increase your sales and leads through tailored strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to understand your needs and exceed expectations.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet our dedicated team ready to elevate your business.

team.name: Jordan Slover
team.bio: Jordan leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring every partnership is a success. With years of experience, Jordan is committed to your growth.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We dive deep into your business to understand your goals and challenges.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Our team begins executing the agreed-upon strategies.

process.title: Optimization
process.description: We fine-tune campaigns to ensure maximum effectiveness.

process.title: Review & Next Steps
process.description: We assess results and plan future initiatives.
